mapper.select: SELECT R.PRODUCT_NO, R.CLAIMER_ID, R.SELLER_ID, R.REPORT_DATE, R.REPORT_CONTENT, R.REPORT_STATUS, RS.READ_STATUS FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN REPORT_READ_STATUS RS ON R.PRODUCT_NO = RS.PRODUCT_NO AND R.CLAIMER_ID = RS.CLAIMER_ID AND R.SELLER_ID = RS.SELLER_ID WHERE RS.ADMIN_ID = #{adminId}

SELECT R.PRODUCT_NO, R.CLAIMER_ID, R.SELLER_ID, R.REPORT_DATE, R.REPORT_CONTENT, R.REPORT_STATUS, RS.READ_STATUS FROM REPORT R LEFT JOIN REPORT_READ_STATUS RS ON R.PRODUCT_NO = RS.PRODUCT_NO AND R.CLAIMER_ID = RS.CLAIMER_ID AND R.SELLER_ID = RS.SELLER_ID WHERE R.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND R.CLAIMER_ID = #{claimerId} AND R.SELLER_ID = #{sellerId}
